Hymn.Arabic: اسْتَمِعْ يَا اللَّهُ عَدْلِي وَأَصْغُ إلَى طِلبَتِي ، وَأَنْصِتْ إِلَى صَلَاتِي ، فَإِنَّهَا مِنْ شَفْتَيْنِ بِلَا غِشَ ،
Hymn.English: 17:1 Hear a just cause, O Lord, Attend to my cry; Give ear to my prayer which is not from deceitful lips.
2 Let my vindication come from Your presence; Let Your eyes look on the things that are upright.     Alleluia
